text: Hussein Abdul-Wahid (born 19 January 1993 in Basra, Iraq) is an Iraqi football midfielder. He currently plays for Al-Minaa in Iraq. ==International debut== On 4 September 2014, Wahid made his International debut against Peru in a friendly match that ended 0–2 for Peru. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Sportspeople from Baghdad Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraq international footballers Category:Sportspeople from Basra Category:Al-Mina'a SC players Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Al-Shorta SC players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Hussein Abdul-Wahid Khalaf
